00121         class AttachStatus {
00122

00124 
00126                 enum State {
00127                     ApoxiDefineScopeEntity(StateAccepted, PdpContextManager_AttachStatus),
00128                     ApoxiDefineScopeEntity(StateRejected, PdpContextManager_AttachStatus),

00131                     ApoxiDefineScopeEntity(StateUnknownCause, PdpContextManager_AttachStatus),
00132                 };
00133

00136                              UINT8 ready_timer = 0,
00137                              UINT8 reject_cause = 0,
00138                              INT t3310_expiries = 0);
00139

00187         static PdpContextControl* GetContextControl(PdpContext *context) {
00188             ASSERT_DEBUG_INFO(s_pdp_contexts.Exists(context),
00189                 L"\nInvalid PDP context!\n");
